inclusion.criterion: Patient is a 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is unable to give consent and no legally authorized representative is available;
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of C diff infections, recent antibx use, and missed ARDS window. Patient is also unable to give consent.
